permissions: Authentication is required. Admins can create newsletters. When an organization is set, organization managers or members of the organization broker can create; if no organization is set, only admins can create.
side_effects: Creates a newsletter record. Publishing may trigger Slack notifications and asynchronous notification jobs; creating/updating a newsletter rebuilds the marketing website.
validation_notes: --body is required. --published-on expects a YYYY-MM-DD date when provided. If is_published is true, published_on and summary are required, and user_scopes must be non-empty and only include: admins, having_broker_membership, having_broker_manager_membership, having_customer_membership, having_customer_manager_membership, having_trucker_membership, having_trucker_manager_membership, having_dispatch_contact_responsibility, having_recent_driver_assignment, having_active_driver_day, having_trucker_financial_contact_assignment, having_prediction_subject_membership. is_public must be false when an organization is present.
